item.description:
A Night of Music and Art
in Celebration of Earth Day!

The Celebration includes Poetry, A Play & Art on display
Hand-Made items for Sale
Live Music by String Theorie

$10 Suggested Donation with proceeds benefiting the co-op and
CT Fund for the Environment

Alchemy Cafe & The Growing Green Co-op are very actively pursuing a mission to improve the quality of health and life in the community, in collaboration with other green businesses and organic farms around the state, and they are big supporters of the arts! www.growinggreencoop.com

CT Fund for the Environment is a non-profit organization that has been very busy cleaning up the Long Island Sound to help keep CT beaches beautiful. Find out more about their organization and what they are doing to help our environment www.ctenvironment.org

Creative Conscience Arts Collaborative is an organization of artists and musicians, designers and local businesses collaborating together to build up the creative community for a good cause. By promoting arts and culture and putting on events for the purpose of entertainment and education, we are building up the Greater Hartford area one show at a time!

Setup time for artists and vendors is from 4-7pm. This is a one-night show! Artwork will be taken down at the end of the night, between 10-11pm. Artists may bring 1-5 pieces.
For more info and if interested in exhibiting or vending, please contact Stephanie Lush
860.967.6327 slushrocker@yahoo.com

Saturday, April 24th
at The Growing Green Co-op , 197 New Britain Ave, Hartford 06106
7:30-10:00pm
item.name: Earthday Celebration Art & Music Show
